model.administration

Class UserDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.administration.UserDB

  • public class UserDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds login info for multiple users.
    Author:
    Mason Stevenson

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String DATABASE
      Relative (from project root) path to the file containing user info.
      private static java.lang.String DELIM
      The string that delimits the items in the user info file.
      private java.util.ArrayList<User> users
      A list of all registered users.

        public boolean addUser(User newUser,
                       boolean doUpdate)
        Adds a user to the db.
        Parameters:
        newUser - A user to add.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the add was successful.

      • removeUser

        public boolean removeUser(User target)
        Removes a user from the db.
        Parameters:
        target - A user to remove.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the remove was successful.

      • editUserType

        public boolean editUserType(User target,
                            char newType)
        Changes a user's permission type.
        Parameters:
        target - A user to change.
        newType - A permission type. (See UserTypes.java)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the change was successful.

      • getUsers

        public java.util.Collection<User> getUsers()
        Returns:
        Returns the db.

      • get

        public User get(java.lang.String id)
        Returns a user with the corresponding user id.
        Parameters:
        id - The target id.
        Returns:
        Returns a user, or null if the id does not match the one in the database.

      • login

        public User login(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String password)
        Fetches a matching User object if supplied with a valid user id and password.
        Parameters:
        id - A user id.
        password - A user password.
        Returns:
        Returns a User object, or null.

      • logout

        public boolean logout()
        Logs the current user out.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the logout was successful.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the user database to system.out
